title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.8 - Fine or suspension for pilot's noncompliance with regulations of the Federal government for the use of Ambrose or other channels or areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 56.8 - Fine or suspension for pilot's noncompliance with regulations of the Federal government for the use of Ambrose or other channels or areas

State Regulations

The pilot of any vessel who shall fail to comply strictly
with regulations prescribed by the Federal government for the use of Ambrose

Channel or other channels or areas, shall be subject to a fine of $100 or
suspension of license, at the discretion of the commissioners. No order or
request by the master, agent or owner of the vessel shall be held to exonerate
the pilot from this penalty. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
